logentry.msg: DISTRELEC-3830: Wrong availability displayed in the following case: Site (e.g. IT) has an exclusiveFast and an exclusiveSlow warehouse. There is NO StockLevel for exclusiveFast but normalFast and there is also a StockLevel for the exclusiveSlow warehouse. => calculation returned an availability for normalFast although there in an exclusiveSlow!
